query: SELECT id, name, CHAR_LENGTH(mapData) as mapData_length, LEFT(mapData, 400) as mapData_sample FROM trip_routes WHERE tripId = 30001 LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT id, name, CHAR_LENGTH(mapData) as mapData_length, LEFT(mapData, 400) as mapData_sample FROM trip_routes WHERE tripId = 30001 LIMIT 5;
